> Senior Software Developer with 6+ years of experience building scalable web applications, focusing on architectural integrity, secure authentication, and a growth-oriented professional journey.

## Professional Profile
- **Expertise:** Specialist in React/Next.js (Frontend) and Node.js/DynamoDB (Backend).
- **Core Values:** Prioritizes innovation in system architecture and long-term mastery over quick fixes.
- **Narrative:** Transitioned from customer service to senior engineering, fostering a holistic understanding of user impact and system reliability.

## Technical Skills & Practices
- **Security:** Extensive experience with OAuth servers and WebAuthn/Passkey implementation.
- **Architecture:** Expertise in domain-driven design, monorepo management (pnpm), and standardized codebases (ESLint/Prettier).
- **Testing:** Strong culture of TDD using Vitest and Jest for high-quality, maintainable services.
